text: 16.2 Town centres form an important part of the borough’s distinct identity and character, acting as anchors for local neighbourhoods with a mix of uses and activities that draws our diverse communities together and provide spaces for local entrepreneurs and independent businesses and employment opportunities for local residents. The nature of our town centres continues to change and evolve – they are increasingly becoming hubs for leisure, social and community activities, not just for shopping. They also provide significant opportunities for employment and housing, particularly on upper floors.
